channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Britpop rockers Oasis reunite for first concert in 16 years
item.description: The feuding Gallagher brothers kicked off a reunion tour in Cardiff, Wales, their first performance since their acrimonious split in 2009.

item.title: Hamas issues "positive response" to latest Gaza ceasefire proposal
item.description: The Hamas terrorist group said Friday it has issued a "positive response" to a U.S.-mediated ceasefire proposal​ in its war with Israel.

item.title: Dozens dead in Texas after devastating floods slam Hill Country, officials say
item.description: "Between 23 and 25" campers are still believed to be missing from Camp Mystic, an all-girls camp, officials said Friday night.

item.title: Texas officials give update on death toll, rescue efforts amid flooding
item.description: Officials in central Texas say dozens of people are dead after major flooding hit the area. Gov. Greg Abbott and other officials held a news conferenc...

item.title: Human remains found at California fireworks warehouse explosion site, officials say
item.description: Seven people were "unaccounted for" in Yolo County's town of Esparto after several explosions at a fireworks warehouse resulted in a fire, officials s...

item.title: President Trump says he wants to stage UFC fight on White House grounds
item.description: President Trump has announced that an Ultimate Fighting Championship bout will be held on the grounds of the White House next year, one of many events...

item.title: Trump says ceasefire deal is near as Israeli strikes kill 138 Palestinians in Gaza
item.description: More than 60 of those killed were waiting for aid, according to Palestinian health officials. President Trump said Friday that talks over a ceasefire ...

item.title: Russia hits Ukraine with largest aerial attack as Trump talks to Zelenskyy and Putin
item.description: Russian missiles and drones hammered Kyiv in an overnight attack, the largest aerial assault on the Ukrainian capital since the war began more than th...

item.title: Adult education programs in limbo as Trump administration withholds grant funds
item.description: The Trump administration is withholding $715 million for adult funding nationwide. This has left programs that serve over a million students a year sc...

item.title: Medicaid's many different names may cause confusion about who's losing coverage
item.description: Medicaid programs go by so many different names across the country that advocates and experts warn people may not know they're losing their coverage u...

item.title: 24 dead in Texas floods and more than 20 children missing from a girls summer camp
item.description: Heavy rains have caused devastating flash floods in Texas Hill Country, killing at least 24 people and leaving many others missing.

item.title: Flash floods like the one that swept through Texas are the nation’s top storm-related killer
Texas families plead for information on at least 23 girls missing from summer camp after floods
Hamas says it delivered 'positive response' on Gaza ceasefire plan
item.description: The group said it was ready to begin negotiations immediately after Donald Trump said Israel had accepted conditions for a 60-day ceasefire.

item.title: Trump signs sweeping tax and spending bill into law
item.description: A signing ceremony at the White House on Friday afternoon kicked off celebrations for 4 July.

item.title: Hamas says it delivered 'positive response' on Gaza ceasefire plan
item.description: The group said it was ready to begin negotiations immediately after Donald Trump said Israel had accepted conditions for a 60-day ceasefire.

item.title: Watch: Moment Oasis take to the stage for first gig in 16 years
item.description: The Gallagher brothers play their first concert since reuniting, in front of a packed Cardiff stadium.

item.title: Sport agent Jonathan Barnett accused of rape in US lawsuit
item.description: Barnett denies allegations he kept the woman as a "sex slave" over a six year period.
